name: Rebound (itch) (EOShadows, Knocktane)
description:
This is no ordinary top-down shooter.  

In this game of survival and taking down enemies, there is a slight twist to the popular genre.  You must take an unconventional means of fighting enemies who's only goal is to make sure you die.

  • Made in under 72 hours for MashUp Game Jam 2.

Small note: you can pause the game by pressing ESC (twice if you're playing on the browser in fullscreen mode). 

Credits:

  • Programming/Code/Game Design - EOShadows
  • Graphics/Art/Music/SFX/Game Design - Kn0cktane
